contents.item: Your calling is whatever motivates you more than money
There is no interaction without God with interaction with men
Our fellowship is with God and His people
Be strategic and purposeful in whatever you do
Throw away the doctrine of waiting for confirmation
Don’t neglect your calling all in the name of employment
Living in active consciousness is being in the “here and now
We cannot glorify God when we refuse to celebrate others
When you love your neighbor, you won’t have problems with embracing them
You cannot reach God until you begin to pay attention to humans
You can only build yourself effectively in the area of your calling
Appreciate others so that you can be appreciated
No amount of money can recover lost time
Reflect and meditate on yourself and discover ways to multiply yourself
Your calling is in what you can do with human interference
Our time is the life we have at the moment
Work is an instrument through which you build yourself
The life in our possession is our time
All products are a multiplication of time invested
Everything looks for you when you become great
When you serve people, God will send people to bless you
Love everybody, believers or not
Your calling is buried in your background on earth
Effectiveness of life is not in self aggrandising
When you love God for real, you will love His creation
Your calling should bless and affect the lives of others for good
Purpose is the essence of life
Our ability to convert time determines how great we will become
Joblessness sets you free psychologically
Your calling should be your work
The principle of God is love
It’s not about who they are, but about God’s principle
Intensity is the extreme application of force and strength
It is only when you study and understand people that you begin to see God’s principles in them
The best way to appreciate God is to appreciate His creation
For your life to count, you need to begin to live for others
To live a selfish life is the fastest track to catastrophe
To live an effective life, you must understand the essence and secret of life
Time is the content of life
Employment wastes the productive time of our lives
There is no serving God without serving man
God is aware of the hypocrisy in the hearts of men
Our attitude to others dictate God’s attitude to us
God treats us the same way we treat one another
Always appreciate the good in people
Life is about fruitfulness
The idea of life is maximizing your time and living and effective life
Don’t exert all your energy on employment, locate your purpose
Celebrating people is a form of love
Living for your purpose is equivalent to living for the Kingdom of God
Living a selfish life is a recipe for disaster
Being married or having children does not mean you are living an effective life
The purpose of life has eternal consequences
Life should be used to fulfill the purposes of the Kingdom
Life is about pursuing the essence of creation
A good swordsman is more important than a good sword.
Joblessness brings you face to face with destiny
Your calling is in what you often think about
Greatness is an attainment bought with the currency of time
Don’t go in the opposite direction, locate your calling
Everyone should be seen as a carrier of God’s nature
Serve God and get grace to serve people
What is life to Spirit, is death to the ego.
contents.owner: Vivian Amis, I Am: The Key to Manifesting

contents.item: Celebrate God daily by celebrating His creation
Employment is the biggest form of slavery
The content of a man is the life he possesses inside
The first thing to do after you get fired is to discover God
Always ask yourself if you are really serving God
You only get fulfillment when you work in your land of promise
The best way to celebrate God is to glorify His creation
You cannot serve God without serving people
The material of life is made from time
Man is the centrality of God’s purpose on earth
Don’t betray the purpose of your creation
Your destiny is connected with your calling
We all have the potential to be great and the seed of greatness
The nature of God is in every man
Brotherly love should be our number one principle as believers
The service of God is in people
The God that is nearest to you in the people around you is the real one you need
Life is not about longevity but about effectiveness
Sacrifices by believers should not be done out of pity
The only way to love God is by loving His people
Money does not determine our worth
You only work right when you are fulfilling the essence of your creation
God is connected to people
Life was given to us for an assignment
Life is given to bring the will of God on earth
Always take an inventory of your life
All men are equal in God’s presence
